title: A Naturalistic Open Source Movie for Optical Flow Evaluation

tldr.text: A new optical flow data set derived from the open source 3D animated short film Sintel is introduced, which has important features not present in the popular Middlebury flow evaluation: long sequences, large motions, specular reflections, motion blur, defocus blur, and atmospheric effects.
